comments.author: darkdarknesss3
comments.body: Visualization, or the practice of creating mental images, can have numerous advantages, including:Goal attainment: Visualizing a desired outcome can help increase motivation and focus, making it more likely for individuals to achieve their goals.Stress reduction: Visualization can be used as a relaxation technique to reduce stress and anxiety by imagining peaceful, calming scenes or scenarios.Improved performance: Athletes and performers often use visualization to enhance their performance by mentally rehearsing their actions, increasing confidence and skill.Enhanced creativity: Visualization can also boost creativity by allowing individuals to imagine new ideas and concepts, visualize solutions to problems, and explore different possibilities.Improved memory: Visualizing information can help with retention and recall, as the brain is better able to remember visual images and associations.Overall, visualization can be a powerful tool for improving various aspects of one's life, from achieving personal goals to reducing stress and anxiety.

People don't usually realize the kind of garbage/harmful info a dirty mind can produce even though they may look too attractive/fancy/useful. But when they are subjected to thorough review it becomes obvious that they are not really safe. You don't just trust your mind when it's dirty. A clean mind will actually prefer mental images/videos that come automatically with little to no effort... Or without thinking about them. Those are usually messages sent from above inform of visions and they are very reliable and can be trusted. We don't just trust our human efforts... We may be lucky most times if we don't think or imagine outside our set boundaries, law, commandments or Word of the CREATOR. But not everyone understands or knows the boundaries.
